Docs.summary: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>命名空间包含实现和技术之间的互操作的类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。 使用类时 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> ，可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 在页面上承载控件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，并在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 基于的应用程序中承载元素。
实现互操作功能的两个关键类是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> 。 使用哪个类取决于您的控件实现：
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>当必须使用页面上的控件时，请使用类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>当必须 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 在基于的应用程序中使用元素时，请使用类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 。
